entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9 except minus 3 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light before morning. Low minus 9 except minus 3 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:39 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing late in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:39 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 12 except minus 8 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12 except minus 8 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:39 PM AST Tuesday 10 January 2023
